PharmacyProfile.title: Pharmacy Profile
PharmacyProfile.description: Represents the profile of a pharmacy owner.

ownerName.description: The name of the pharmacy owner.

email.description: The contact email for the pharmacy.

licenseCertificateUrl.description: URL of the uploaded license certificate.

kycUrl.description: URL of the uploaded KYC document.

location.description: The physical address of the pharmacy.

timings.description: The operating hours of the pharmacy.

isOpen.description: Indicates if the pharmacy is currently open or closed.

status.description: Indicates if the pharmacy is currently open (true) or closed (false).

StockItem.title: Stock Item
StockItem.description: Represents an item in the pharmacy's stock.

requiresPrescription.description: Indicates if a prescription is required.

expiryDate.description: The expiry date of the medicine.

lowStockThreshold.description: The threshold for a low stock warning.

MediNotifyItem.title: MediNotify Item
MediNotifyItem.description: Represents a notification in the MediNotify collection.

message.description: The content of the notification message.

date.description: The timestamp when the notification was created.

isRead.description: Indicates if the notification has been read.

/pharmacies/{pharmacyId}.description: Stores pharmacy profile information, where the document ID is the Firebase Auth UID.

/pharmacies/{pharmacyId}/stock/{stockId}.description: Stores stock items for a specific pharmacy.

/pharmacies/{pharmacyId}/MediNotify/{not.description: Stores notifications for a specific pharmacy.
